cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY Off HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY1' S G0Y3RNMBHI)SECRET. *f ................1,1 "0.F.-1126.Copy XJoCABINET.TREATY OP PEACE WITH TURKEY. BATUM.Copy of letter from Sir Maurice Hankey to, Mr. H.WcMalkln.(Circulated for information). (See alBO Paper Ho.C.Pc729).Royal Hotel, SAI1 REMO, 20th April, 1920.My dear Malkin,The Supreme Counoil to-day had under consideration the question of Batum, snd reached the following decisions:-(a) That it ttas highly desirable to obtain . an agreement between Armenia, Georgia and Azerbaijan regarding the Port of Batum.(b) That this agreement need not be incorporated in the Treaty with Turkey, but should bo signed at the same time as the Treaty or,if possible, earlier.Yours sincerely, (Signed) M.P.A.HAHKEY,H. V7. Malkin, Esq., . \ British Representative;en the Drafting Committee.i "Whitehall Gardens, o.'.V.l., 2.5xd/*piil, 1920. , .
